Articles.Content: I challenge somebody here to make an exact scale model of the Sabre from Halo Reach and get it into space using the launch pad only, and only using stock parts. It has to at least reach sub-orbit but it would be cooler if it reached orbit. It does not have to have 7 stages like the actual Sabre but the more exact to specifications the better. If you dont know what the Sabre is, look it up to get an idea and share your results if you manage to make one.
I do belive u mean the YSS-1000 Sabre employed in Operation Uppercut during the battle for Reach

It won\'t go into orbit currently but it works fine in atmosphere It looks as close as I could get it with stock parts You\'re welcome to improve it if you like 8)

Enjoy!
Nice Job Rath!
I aim to please
Looks pretty awesome, but someone should do a pelican all the same
That was very good, i suck at spaceplanes so i could never tweak it to get it into orbit but your the first so far to attempt this, nice work.

Sabre, the secret space program dismissed by three Kerbal administrations as preposterous rumor. Sounds appropriate lol.

May try this challenge out later, big Halo fan.

It is complete! A Space faring Sabre! It\'s first stage is enough to put it into orbit with a whole tank left! It can easily get you to Minmus, the moon, and back All stock too! But be careful, it\'s big and laggy!

Enjoy, guys!
Oh and by the way, I highly recommend MechJeb!
haha i love it! very well done, my computer might explode trying to launch it but A+ work, couldn\'t of done better myself.

couldn\'t of done better myself.

you never even showed the slightest sign of trying your own challenge yourself, so that\'s not very hard to believe.

also, 'couldn\'t of' means naught.

Hunter, My comp specs are here:http://support.acer.com/acerpanam/notebook/2010/Acer/Aspire/Aspire5741/Aspire5741sp4.shtml

If yours is better then you\'ll fly it fine
In reality, that mission of Reach is kinda hard on Legendary.

Made one that gets into orbit in one shot. I used mech jeb but I don\'t think there were any other non-stock parts. The thing does NOT want to take off, though. There is a huge graveyard of these things at the end of my runway. Should have easily enough fuel visit (but not land on) one of the muns and get back safely.
very nice job andydouble07, would love to see that thing landed on the Mun, im amazed you even got it there. The UNSC would be proud!
been playing around with this challenge last night. When I get back from the orafice I will post my contraption

It won\'t go into orbit currently but it works fine in atmosphere It looks as close as I could get it with stock parts You\'re welcome to improve it if you like 8)

Enjoy!
